Ranger Archetype: 1 selection
Fey Wanderer Magic: Fey association shows a minor physical effect
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of Egyptian-Nephthys and fellow believers

Skill Notes:
Canny: Language (Choose 2 from any)
Otherworldly Glamour: Skill Proficiency (Choose 1 from Deception, Performance, Persuasion)
Canny: +6 on a chosen proficient skill
Dungeon Delver: Has advantage on Perception and Investigation (secret door detection)/Suffers no Perception penalty when traveling at a fast pace
Feral Senses: R30' Can locate invisible creatures
Healer: Using a healer's kit to stabilize also restores 1 hit point/Can use a healer's kit to restore 1d6+4 + target HD hit points once per creature per short rest
Vanish: Can hide as a bonus action and can be tracked only via magic
Combat
Hit Points: 161 Initiative: 6 Armor Class: 13 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: None Weapons: Greataxe (+7 1d12+1); Mace (+7 1d6+1); Shortsword (+7 1d6+1); Unarmed (+7 1+1)
Combat Notes:
Alert: +5 Initiative
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Mighty Swarm: Gathered Swarm inflicts 1d8
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Alert: Cannot be surprised, and unseen foes gain no advantage on attacks on self
Beguiling Twist: R120' Can use a reaction to redirect a failed charm or fright effect to a different target for 1 min (save DC 17 Wisdom ends)
Dreadful Strikes: Can inflict +1d6 HP psychic with a weapon once per rd
Favored Foe: Can mark a target with a successful attack for concentration up to 1 min 6 times per long rest; the first hit each rd on a marked foe inflicts +1d8 HP weapon damage
Feral Senses: Suffers no disadvantage vs. an invisible foe
Fighting Style (Blind Fighting): R10' Can detect the locations of unseen creatures
Fighting Style (Thrown Weapon Fighting): Can draw a thrown weapon as part of an attack, and thrown weapons inflict +2 HP
Foe Slayer: Can gain a choice of +3 attack or damage vs. a favored enemy once per rd
Gathered Swarm: After 1 successful attack each rd, can move 5', move the target 15' (save DC 17 Strength negates), or inflict +1d8 HP piercing
Martial Versatility: Can replace a Fighting Style or maneuver when boosting an ability or taking a feat
Mighty Swarm: Gathered Swarm gives half cover when moving self or knocks prone when moving foe
Savage Attacker: Can take the best of two melee damage rolls once per rd
Swarming Dispersal: Can use a reaction When hit to gain resistance to the damage and to teleport 30' 6 times per long rest
Tireless: Can gain 1d8+3 temporary hit points 6 times per long rest, and a short rest reduces exhaustion by 1
Save Proficiency: Dexterity; Strength
Save: Charisma: 2; Constitution: 4; Dexterity: 7; Intelligence: 1; Strength: 7; Wisdom: 3
Save Notes:
Beguiling Twist: Has advantage vs. charm and fright
Dungeon Delver: Has advantage to avoid or resist traps and resistance to trap damage
Land's Stride: Has advantage vs. impeding plants
Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 2; R1: 4; R2: 3; R3: 3; R4: 3; R5: 2; W0: 2; W1: 1 Attack: D: 9; R: 9; W: 7 Spell DC: D: 17; R: 17; W: 15
Spells:
Arcane Eye (R4 [Swarmkeeper Magic] Divi): R30' Self sees with darkvision through a remote invisible eye that can move 30' per rd for concentration up to 1 hr
Beast Sense (R2 [Primal Awareness] Divi): Self can perceive through a touched willing beast's senses for concentration up to 1 hr [R]
Charm Person (R1 [Fey Wanderer Magic] Ench): R30' Target regards self as a friend (save Wisdom negates) for 1 hr or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot regain hit points for 1 rd; undead also suffer disadvantage vs. self attack for 1 rd
Commune With Nature (R5 [Primal Awareness] Divi): Reveals 3 facts about nature within 3 miles, or within 300' when underground [R]
Conjure Woodland Beings (R4 Conj): R60' Summons a choice of 1, 2, 4, or 8 obedient CR 2, 1, half, or quarter fey creatures for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level doubles or triples the number of creatures at level 6 or 8]
Cordon Of Arrows (R2 Tran): R5' Four arrows or crossbow bolts attack non-designated creatures within 30', inflicting 1d6 HP piercing each (save Dexterity negates), for 8 hr [+Level affects +2 pieces]
Dimension Door (R4 [Fey Wanderer Magic] Conj): Teleports self and 1 adjacent willing creature up to 500'
Dispel Magic (R3 [Fey Wanderer Magic] Abju): R120' Ends the effects on the target of a spell up to level 3, and successful DC 10 + spell level checks end each higher-level spell [+Level ends any spell of equal or lesser level]
Dominate Beast (R4 Ench): R60' Target beast obeys telepathic commands (save Wisdom negates; damage allows another save) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level extends the duration to 10 min, 1 hr, or 8 hr at level 5, 6, or 7]
Ensnaring Strike (R1 Conj): Next successful self attack restrains the foe and inflicts 1d6 HP per rd piercing (save Strength ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Entangle (R1 Conj): R90' 20' sq ensnares creatures (save Strength negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Faerie Fire (R1 [Swarmkeeper Magic] Evoc): R60' Objects in a 20' cube glow, giving foes advantage on attacks (save Dexterity negates), for concentration up to 1 min
Fog Cloud (R1 Conj): R120' 20' radius obscures vision for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level increases the radius by 20']
Gaseous Form (R3 [Swarmkeeper Magic] Tran): Touched creature becomes gaseous, gaining a 10' fly Speed and advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saves, for concentration up to 1 hr
Greater Restoration (R5 Abju): Touched recovers from exhausted, charmed, petrified, cursed, or ability damage or regains hit point maximum
Insect Plague (R5 [Swarmkeeper Magic] Conj): R300' 20' radius inflicts 4d10 HP piercing (save Constitution half) for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Locate Animals Or Plants (R2 Divi): Reveals the location within 5 miles of a specified kind of beast or plant [R]
Locate Creature (R4 [Primal Awareness] Divi): Reveals the location of a specified creature or species within 1000' for concentration up to 1 hr; running water blocks
Longstrider (R1 Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]
Mage Armor (W1 Abju): Willing, unarmored touched gains AC 13 + Dexterity modifier for 8 hr; the spell ends if the target dons armor
Mage Hand (R0 [Swarmkeeper Magic] Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Meld Into Stone (R3 Tran): Self steps into rock, losing sight and muffling hearing but allowing casting spells on self, for up to 8 hr [R]
Mislead (R5 [Fey Wanderer Magic] Illu): Makes self invisible and creates an illusory duplicate that can move 70' and share senses for concentration up to 1 hr; attacking or casting ends
Misty Step (R2 [Fey Wanderer Magic] Conj): Teleports self 30'
Misty Step (R2 [Misty Wanderer] Conj): Teleports self 30'
Plant Growth (R3 Tran): R150' Causes plants in a 100' radius to overgrow or enriches a 1/2 mile radius for 1 year
Ray Of Frost (W0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Revivify (R3 Necr): Restores life and 1 hit point to a touched 1-minute-old corpse
Shillelagh (D0 Tran): Held club inflicts +9 magical attacks and 1d8+3 HP damage for 1 min
Speak With Animals (R1 [Primal Awareness] Divi): Self can talk with animals for 10 min [R]
Speak With Plants (R3 [Primal Awareness] Tran): Self can talk with and command plants for 10 min
Stoneskin (R4 Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Summon Beast (R2 Conj): R90' Summons an obedient bestial spirit (armor class 13; multiattack equal to half the spell level; inflicts 1d8+6 piercing) of air (20 hit points; fly 60'), land (30 hit points; move and climb 30'), or water (30 hit points; swim 30') for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level increases the armor class by 1, hit points by 5, and damage by 1]
Summon Fey (R3 [Fey Reinforcements] Conj): R90' Summons an obedient fey spirit (armor class 15; 30 hit points; move 40' and can teleport 30'; multiattack equal to half the spell level; short sword inflicts 1d6+6 HP piercing plus 1d6 force), of type fuming (has advantage on next attack in the same turn after teleporting), mirthful (can charm 1 creature within 10' after teleporting (save Wisdom negates)), or tricksy (can create darkness in a 5' cube for 1 rd after teleporting) for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level increases the armor class by 1, hit points by 10, and piercing damage by 1]
Thorn Whip (D0 Tran): R30' Ranged spell inflicts 4d6 HP and pulls a Large or smaller target 10'
Tree Stride (R5 Conj): Self may teleport 500' between like trees once per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Web (R2 [Swarmkeeper Magic] Conj): R60' 20' cube restrains creatures (save Dexterity negates and Strength frees) for concentration up to 1 hr; burning the web inflicts 2d4 HP fire
Magic Notes:
Fighting Style (Druidic Warrior): Knows 2 D0 cantrips
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Knows 2 wizard cantrips and can cast a chosen W1 spell once per long rest
Fey Reinforcements: Can cast Summon Fey, optionally for 1 min instead of for concentration, once per long rest
Fey Wanderer Magic: Knows the Mislead, Dimension Door, Dispel Magic, Misty Step, and Charm Person spells
Fighting Style (Druidic Warrior): Can replace a D0 cantrip when gaining a level
Misty Wanderer: Can cast Misty Step, targeting self and 1 willing adjacent target, 3 times per long rest
Nature's Veil: Can use a bonus action to become invisible for 1 rd 6 times per long rest
Primal Awareness: Can cast Commune With Nature, Locate Creature, Speak With Plants, Beast Sense, and Speak With Animals once each per long rest
Spellcasting Focus: Can use a druidic focus for ranger spells
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the ranger spell list
Swarmkeeper Magic: Knows the Insect Plague, Arcane Eye, Gaseous Form, Web, and Faerie Fire spells and the Mage Hand cantrip
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 2 available vs. 5 allocated
